caption.p: Chromatographic profile of different parts (roots, seeds, leaves, and capitula) of the two varieties A. P var. pyrethrum (L.) and A. P var. depressus (Ball): Rm: roots of. P var. pyrethrum (L.); Gm: seeds of A. P var. pyrethrum (L.); Fm: leaves A. P var. pyrethrum (L.); Cm: capitula of A. P var. pyrethrum (L.); Rf: roots of A. P var. depressus (Ball) Maire; Gf: seeds of A. P var. depressus (Ball) Maire; Ff: leaves of A. P var. depressus (Ball) Maire; Cf: capitula of A. P var. depressus (Ball) Maire.
